name: Ext_R5_CUD_in_in_item
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ClinicalUseDefinition.interaction.interactant.item[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalUseDefinition.interaction.interactant.item[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalUseDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The specific medication, product, food etc. or laboratory test that interacts
element.definition: The specific medication, product, food, substance etc. or laboratory test that interacts.
element.comment: `ClinicalUseDefinition.interaction.interactant.item[x]` maps to R4B `ClinicalUseDefinition.interaction.interactant.item[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionProduct)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The specific medication, product, food etc. or laboratory test that interacts
element.definition: The specific medication, product, food, substance etc. or laboratory test that interacts.
element.comment: `ClinicalUseDefinition.interaction.interactant.item[x]` maps to R4B `ClinicalUseDefinition.interaction.interactant.item[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionProduct)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: An interactant - a substance that may have a clinically significant effect on another.
